data.text: @__goodsalty @RyanBro56797701 @TRF @wef Also, why are u calling people limp dick? How is it that whenever u get questioned, that’s the first thing you go to? Do you see people calling your stinky pussy whenever they disagree with you? Like tf wrong with you

@__goodsalty @RyanBro56797701 @TRF @wef You still can’t answer that one question? Modern feminism deluded u to the point where u think you are always the victim. U still can’t tell me why businesses don’t hire all women if women were paid less for the same work?
@alibali_b @PixelPete2 @TRF Its about choice. You make a choice, and you live with the consequences. The End.

@GazOD1986 @truefauxfunk @rl_libertarian @TRF @wef it means you have high expectations lmao, not everyone with a washing machine is spoiled, but most people wash by hand, if everyone in your neighborhood can afford a washing machine you are already living the good life
@alibali_b @PixelPete2 @TRF Grow thicker skin. It'll serve you well in the long run.
@acthewriter @PixelPete2 @TRF I disagreed with your initial comment, you immediately resorted to being patronising and personal insults, own it. 👋

@alibali_b @PixelPete2 @TRF I couldn't give a rat's derriere that you think my tweet speaks "volumes" about me. You've been salty with me for three days now, because I don't agree with your flimsy theories. Hilarious. Try getting out more. 😂
